The Challenge

In today's digital age, youth are more engaged with mobile games than with traditional religious practices. Conventional methods like sermons or Bible studies often fail to capture their interest, creating a significant gap in spiritual growth and Bible engagement among young believers.

💡
Our Solution

City of Faith bridges this gap by using gamification to encourage daily Bible reading and reflection. By integrating biblical content into an engaging city-building experience with interactive features, we transform spiritual practices into captivating digital experiences.

Game Features

🏙️

City Building

Build and expand your own biblical city while learning about faith and community through engaging gameplay mechanics.

🌾

Faith-Based Farming

Cultivate crops and tend to your land while reflecting on biblical principles of stewardship and growth.

👥

Biblical NPCs

Interact with characters from the Bible through engaging quizzes and conversations that bring scripture to life.

📚

Bible Quizzes

Test your knowledge and deepen your understanding with interactive quizzes based on biblical stories and teachings.

🎯

Parable Minigames

Experience Jesus's parables through interactive minigames that make timeless lessons memorable and fun.

📖

Daily Devotionals

Engage with daily reflections and devotional content seamlessly integrated into your gaming experience.

🧠
Theoretical Foundation

Grounded in Digital Spirituality, Self-Determination Theory, and Moral Foundations Theory, City of Faith motivates users through autonomy, reward systems, and ethical storytelling. The game aims to reconnect youth with their faith by aligning spiritual growth with the digital habits they already enjoy.

🎯
Our Mission

To transform how young people engage with their faith by creating an innovative platform that makes Bible study interactive, enjoyable, and relevant to their digital lifestyle. We believe that faith and technology can work together to create meaningful spiritual experiences.
